Joplin.Joplin School District:
The Joplin School District is located in Jasper and Newton Counties in the City of Joplin, Missouri. It serves more than 7,395 students in the School District.


== Major Cities Served ==
Joplin, Missouri
Duenweg, Missouri
Webb City, Missouri (Partial)
Duquesne, Missouri


== Recent history ==
On May 22, 2011, an EF5 tornado Ripped through Joplin, Missouri.
